narrative:
Inspection took place at a location in MA at the time the registered carrier picked up animals at a Licensee for
transport to other locations.  There were no non-compliant items identified.
NOTE - Exit briefing held 7/9/18 on-site with facility representative.  Report delivered by e-mail 7/9/18.
*END OF REPORT*
